idea:
PROEPR is an incorporated PRO (Producer Responsibility Organisation) that offers unique EEE (Electrical Electronic Equipment) & WEEE (Waste Electrical Electronic Equipment) Compliance solutions post the introduction of regulated responsibilities for Global and India based producers.
The unique individual skills, knowledge and experience of the management team at PROEPR make it the perfect choice for large, medium or small producers in meeting all or part of their responsibilities under the E Waste Regulations 2016.
We believe passionately that it is the informal sector that presents the answer to the growth required in the formal sector to meet the Government targets imposed on the Producers.
name: EPR COMPLIANCE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
ARTHAT STUDIO is a collective space based in Mumbai. We are a unique one-stop shop for all your creative needs. Whether this is your first step or your next step in Event Design & Productions, Virtual Experience, Advertising, Graphic design, Street Art, Animation, Illustration, Art installation, Production services, Photography, Content, Experience marketing to Brand building.


As a team, we are intrigued by new possibilities. Put through thoughts, ideas, concepts, processes and designs to play, giving the end-user an immersive brand experience. We create work which makes a difference, goes beyond awareness and anticipation, leaving real impact on your consumer across all relevant touch points.We are n integrated communications agency and production house. A one-stop HUB for all your communication needs.
name: ARTHAT STUDIO LLP

idea:
We are a RBI authorised Full Fledged Money Changer , We Buy & Sell all major global currencies , we also deal in sale of Multi currency Cards . 
We do foreign remittance for education , family maintenance , outdoor film shoots & medical purposes .. We are also in MTSS business services in association with Western Union , Money Gram , Xpress Money , Ria Money , Transfast .. 
We also have recently started as a advisor in insurance ..
So our USP is to provide a wide range of Money related services all inter related and useful for a local as well as Foreigners coming in Mumbai as Tourist , Business man , Medical Treatment , Students etc. under one roof .
name: VIRAAJ MULTIFOREX PRIVATE LIMITED
